mapper.select: select id, password, email, name, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user values (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, now(), #{id}, null, null)
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, updated_at = now(), updated_by = #{id} where id = #{id}
